entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
